remarks.format: ## Remarks 编码是将一组 Unicode 字符转换为一个字节序列的过程。Encoding is the process of transforming a set of Unicode characters into a sequence of bytes. 解码是将编码字节序列转换为一组 Unicode 字符的过程。Decoding is the process of transforming a sequence of encoded bytes into a set of Unicode characters. [Unicode 标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)为每个受支持脚本中的每个字符分配一个码位（数字）。The [Unicode Standard](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) assigns a code point (a number) to each character in every supported script. Unicode 转换格式（UTF）是对该码位进行编码的一种方法。A Unicode Transformation Format (UTF) is a way to encode that code point. [Unicode 标准](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123)使用以下 UTFs：The [Unicode Standard](https://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=37123) uses the following UTFs: - UTF-8，它将每个码位表示为一至四个字节的序列。UTF-8, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to four bytes. - UTF-16，它将每个码位表示为一个到 2 16 位整数的序列。UTF-16, which represents each code point as a sequence of one to two 16-bit integers. - 32，它将每个码位表示为32位整数。UTF-32, which represents each code point as a 32-bit integer. 有关 支持的 UTFs 和其他编码的详细信息，请参阅[.net 中的字符编码](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md)。For more information about the UTFs and other encodings supported by , see [Character Encoding in .NET](~/docs/standard/base-types/character-encoding.md). 类表示32编码。The class represents a UTF-32 encoding. 编码器可以使用大字节序字节顺序（首先是最高有效字节）或 little endian 字节顺序（首先是最小有效字节）。The encoder can use the big endian byte order (most significant byte first) or the little endian byte order (least significant byte first). 例如，拉丁文大写字母 A （码位 U + 0041）按以下方式序列化（十六进制）：For example, the Latin Capital Letter A (code point U+0041) is serialized as follows (in hexadecimal): - 大 endian 字节顺序： 00 00 00 41Big endian byte order: 00 00 00 41 - 小 endian 字节顺序： 41 00 00 00Little endian byte order: 41 00 00 00 使用本机字节顺序存储 Unicode 字符通常更有效。It is generally more efficient to store Unicode characters using the native byte order. 例如，最好使用 little endian 平台（如 Intel 计算机）上的 little endian 字节顺序。For example, it is better to use the little endian byte order on little endian platforms, such as Intel computers. 对应于 Windows 代码页12000（little endian 字节顺序）和12001（大 endian 字节顺序）。 corresponds to the Windows code pages 12000 (little endian byte order) and 12001 (big endian byte order). 可以通过调用 方法来确定特定体系结构的 "endian"。You can determine the "endianness" of a particular architecture by calling the method. （可选） 对象提供字节顺序标记（BOM），这是一个字节数组，可以作为编码过程中所产生的字节序列的前缀。Optionally, the object provides a byte order mark (BOM), which is an array of bytes that can be prefixed to the sequence of bytes resulting from the encoding process. 如果前导头包含字节顺序标记（BOM），则它有助于解码器确定字节数组的字节顺序和转换格式。If the preamble contains a byte order mark (BOM), it helps the decoder determine the byte order and the transformation format or UTF of a byte array. 如果实例配置为提供 BOM，可以通过调用检索方法; 否则，该方法返回空数组。If the instance is configured to provide a BOM, you can retrieve it by calling the method; otherwise, the method returns an empty array. 请注意，即使BOM 支持的配置对象时，必须包含 BOM 将编码的字节流作为相应; 开头的编码方法类执行未自动执行此操作。Note that, even if a object is configured for BOM support, you must include the BOM at the beginning of the encoded byte stream as appropriate; the encoding methods of the class do not do this automatically. > [!CAUTION] > 若要启用错误检测并使类实例更安全，应通过调用 构造函数并将其 `throwOnInvalidBytes` 参数设置为 `true`来实例化 的对象。To enable error 异常。With error detection, a method that detects an invalid sequence of characters or bytes throws an exception. 如果未检测到错误，则不会引发异常，并且通常会忽略无效序列。Without error detection, no exception is thrown, and the
